definition: Miyagi prefecture in the north of Japan's main island Honshū 本州[Ben3 zhou1]
palace/temple/castration (as corporal punishment)/first note in pentatonic scale
surname Gong
city walls/city/town/CL:座[zuo4],道[dao4],個|个[ge4]
county

sentences.english: Back at Ishinomaki Okawa Elementary, the grandfather on the hill hasn't budged.
sentences.chinese: 在宮城縣大川小學，坐在山頭的祖父還沒有離開。

sentences.english: 29Survivors prayed at the wreckage of a house in Natori, Miyagi prefecture, northern Japan.
sentences.chinese: 在宮城縣的名取郡，倖存者在房屋廢墟中祈禱。

sentences.english: The epicenter was about 40 kilometers under the sea off the coast of Miyagi prefecture.
sentences.chinese: 該震源位於宮城縣沿岸深度約40公里處。

sentences.english: It covered Pacific coastal areas of Iwate, Miyagi and Fukushima prefectures.
sentences.chinese: 它涵蓋的巖手縣，宮城縣和福島縣太平洋沿岸地區。

sentences.english: Tsunami waves hit Japan's Miyagi and Fukushima prefectures, officials said.
sentences.chinese: 海嘯襲擊日本的宮城縣和福島縣，官員說。

sentences.english: As far as the eye can see near Ishinomaki's city hospital, little debris has budged.
sentences.chinese: 在宮城縣市立醫院可以看到，殘骸幾乎沒有被移走。

sentences.english: People evacuated to a rooftop at the port in Kesennuma in Miyagi prefecture.
sentences.chinese: 宮城縣氣仙沼港口的民衆都撤離到了屋頂。

sentences.english: Expressways in Miyagi were also closed.
sentences.chinese: 宮城縣的高速公路也已經關閉。

sentences.english: It's the official opening of the new semester in Ishinomaki city.
sentences.chinese: 宮城縣新學期正式開學。

sentences.english: Up to 10,000 people remained unaccounted for in Minamisanriku of Miyagi Prefecture.
sentences.chinese: 宮城縣南三陸町有約1萬人仍下落不明。

sentences.english: Yamagata Miyagi Prefectural to go to the bus stop, from yesterday overcrowded.
sentences.chinese: 宮城縣廳前去往山形的巴士站，從昨天開始人滿爲患。
